translations: v.（身体）补充水分；（使）水合；（使）成水合物

phrs.translation: 气体水合物，天然气水合物
水合氯醛；水合三氯乙醛
消石灰；熟石灰（等于slaked lime）

sentences.sentence: After-sun products will cool and hydrate your skin.
sentences.translation: 晒后护肤品会清凉肌肤并为其补水。

sentences.sentence: Water. Be sure to hydrate throughout the day.
sentences.translation: 一整天都应确保水的摄入。
